data.name: Iron Tracks TD
data.detailed_description:
Build Defenses

You are up for a bumpy ride. Equip your train with a selection of guns and upgrade modules. However, you will need to pick carefully as not each weapon is good for each enemy and you have limited space and resources.


Transport Cargo

You will have a chance to transport cargo for various remaining countries and not all cargo is the same! Pick their location carefully and make sure to put them in defensible locations. Earn money for each successful delivery!

Do a Fast Delivery

Cargo is best served fast and hot. Budget your resources carefully to build extra engines on your train and go faster to earn more money and reputation.

Upgrade Your Arsenal

With your hard earned money upgrade and unlock new weapons and utilities. You can never have too many guns!

Explore the Lands

Do your deliveries in different landscapes, each with differing bonuses and difficulties.

data.short_description: Arm and defend your train in this real-time strategy tower defense game. After you make a fast delivery upgrade your weapons and do more dangerous missions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.4 GHZ
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
